subject: Re: global timeout
msgSnippet: I would like a default timeout as well for other reasons.  I have a CruiseControl machine doing continuous integration, and occasionally someone writes a unit
messageBody:
I would like a default timeout as well for other reasons. I have a
CruiseControl machine doing continuous integration, and occasionally
someone writes a unit test that hangs, which also hangs the entire
CruiseControl process. Because the test process never completes, I
can't tell which test hung.

If I could set a default timeout, something generous like 5 minutes,
then hanging tests would eventually fail and everything would wrap up
cleanly. Perhaps a system property would fit the bill.
